EmailTemplate.subject: Get all the labor shortage resources you need!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: #What'sNew@NCR We’re all in this together The labor shortage is a complex issue that not only affects your customers and staff, but your bottom line as well. NCR is here to help you do more with less. We’ve compiled several articles and additional resources to help with your recruiting efforts and, more importantly, to keep your employees motivated once they’re on board – so you can continue to deliver excellent customer experiences. Attract and retain great employees Don't settle for less. Recruit great employees with these best practices other restaurants are using to find and keep talent in 2021. <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/tips-for-restaurant-staff-2021]]> Competition for talent is fierce. Check out some creative ways to set your restaurant apart and attract ideal candidates. <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/6-ways-find-restaurant-employees]]> Having less staff means operating more efficiently. Leverage the latest restaurant technology <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/2021-restaurant-labor-shortage-technology]]>, such as contactless dine-in and payments <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/contactless-restaurant-technology]]>, as well as handheld POS systems <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/aloha-pos]]>, to enable your team to do more, faster. Happy employees create happy guests. Read about how implementing small changes helps reduce stress for your employees, so they’ll stay engaged and motivated <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/staff-for-online-order-volume]]>now and into the future. Aloha POS training Aloha POS training <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/alohapos-training]]> helps you train new employees quickly, so they can begin serving guests sooner. Contactless order & pay Check out this customer story <[[https://www.ncr.com/green-room/blu-jam-cafe]]> describing how NCR helped Blu Jam Café adopt QR code-based order and pay, which improved productivity and reduced their labor costs by 8%. Need help beyond staff? Contact us today <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]>.
